mapr.master

Class TaskInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapr.master.TaskInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TaskInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Encapsulates all metadata for a task, including Task ID, Task Type, I/O File Name, etc.
    Author:
    Derek Tzeng
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskInfo

        public TaskInfo(java.lang.String taskType,
        java.lang.String input,
        java.lang.String output,
        int recordStart,
        int recordEnd,
        int taskID,
        java.lang.String otherArgs,
        int sourceJobID,
        java.lang.String jobType)
        Constructor used for new Mapper tasks.
        Parameters:
        taskType - `mapper`
        input - Input file name
        output - Output file name
        recordStart - Starting point of input file to map
        recordEnd - End point of input file to map
        taskID - Unique TaskID
        otherArgs - Extra user arguments
        sourceJobID - JobID for Mapper task
        jobType - Class name of MapReduce job

      • TaskInfo

        public TaskInfo(java.lang.String taskType,
        java.lang.String input,
        java.lang.String output,
        int taskID,
        int dependency,
        int sourceJobID,
        java.lang.String jobType)
        Constructor used for new Sorter tasks.
        Parameters:
        taskType - `sorter`
        input - Input file name
        output - Output file name
        taskID - Unique TaskID
        dependency - TaskID that sorter depends on before starting
        sourceJobID - JobID for Mapper task
        jobType - Class name of MapReduce job
